SEARCH
Module com.bankinggui
Package bankingsoftware

Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
bankingsoftware.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
AccountDatabase class that is a linear data structure to hold the list of accounts. Has methods to open, close, withdraw, deposit and sort accounts.
Author:
Jia Wern Chong, Frances Cortuna

    • getNumAcct

      public int getNumAcct()
      Getter method to get number of accounts
      Returns:

    • getAccountsArray

      public Account[] getAccountsArray()
      Getter method to get accounts array
      Returns:
      Accounts array

    • find

      private int find(Account account)
      Find an Account in array of Accounts. If Account is in the array, return its index. If not, return -1
      Parameters:
      account - Account to find in the array
      Returns:
      Index of account in array or -1 if not found in array.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      When array is full, grow it's capacity by 4

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Account account)
      Checks if account is in an array. Returns true if event is in array, false otherwise
      Parameters:
      account - Account to be searched in array
      Returns:
      True if event is in array, false otherwise

    • open

      public boolean open(Account account)
      Adds a new account to the array. Returns true if new account is added, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      account - Account to be added to array
      Returns:
      True if new account is added, false otherwise

    • close

      public boolean close(Account account)
      Removes a given account from array. Returns true if account is removed, false otherwise
      Parameters:
      account - Account to be removed from array.
      Returns:
      True if given account is removed, false otherwise.

    • loyaltyStatus

      private boolean loyaltyStatus(MoneyMarket account)
      Checks the account balance and updates isLoyal
      Returns:
      False if account balance is less than 2000, true otherwise

    • withdrawalFee

      private void withdrawalFee(MoneyMarket account)
      Charges withdrawal fee if number of withdrawals is more than 3 times

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Account account)
      Checks if account has sufficient balance for withdrawal and withdraw from account Returns false if balance is insufficient for withdrawal
      Parameters:
      account - Account to withdraw from
      Returns:
      false if insufficient

    • deposit

      public void deposit(Account account)
      Adds money to an account
      Parameters:
      account - Account to deposit into

    • print

      private String print()
      Prints accounts in array

    • swap

      private void swap(int accountOne, int accountTwo)
      Swap the order of account one and account two.
      Parameters:
      accountOne - Index of account one to be swapped with account two
      accountTwo - Index of account two to be swapped with account one

    • compareAcctType

      private int compareAcctType(Account accountOne, Account accountTwo)
      Compares account type of 2 accounts Returns positive number if account one's type is after account two Returns negative number if account one's type is before account two Returns zero of both account type are the same
      Parameters:
      accountOne - Account one to be compared
      accountTwo - Account two to be compared
      Returns:
      a positive number, a negative number or a zero depending on comparison results

    • compareProfile

      private int compareProfile(Account accountOne, Account accountTwo)
      Compares profiles of two accounts Returns positive number if account one's profile is after account two Returns negative number if account one's profile is before account two Returns zero of both account profile are the same
      Parameters:
      accountOne - Account one to be compared
      accountTwo - Account two to be compared
      Returns:
      a positive number, a negative number or a zero depending on comparison results

    • sortAccountTypeProfile

      private void sortAccountTypeProfile(int accountToSort)
      If accounts are switched, it sorts the newly switched account by comparing to previous accounts Sorts by account type, followed by account profile.
      Parameters:
      accountToSort - Account that was switched

    • printSorted

      public String printSorted()
      Sorts and prints account array in order of account type and profile

    • sortAccounts

      private void sortAccounts()
      Sorts account array in order of account type and profile

      public String printFeesAndInterests()
      Calculate and prints the fees/interests

    • printUpdatesBalances

      public String printUpdatesBalances()
      Applies the fees and interests and update account balance If account type is MoneyMarket, reset withdrawals to 0
